titles.title: A bill to authorize the Seminole Tribe of Florida to lease or transfer certain land, and for other purposes.
A bill to authorize the Seminole Tribe of Florida to lease or transfer certain land, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 116-359.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Senate Committee on Indian Affairs discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: This bill allows the Seminole Tribe of Florida to lease, sell, convey, warrant, or transfer its real property that is not held in trust by the United States.
